name: fonts-deva
description:
Meta package to install all Devanagari fonts
 This package allows you to install all available Devanagari fonts
 in Debian.
 .
 This package installs following fonts.
   * fonts-lohit-deva
   * fonts-sahadeva
   * fonts-nakula
   * fonts-deva-extra
   * fonts-samyak-deva
